Name: Ink No. 2
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Muscle shell blue in colour. Vodka charged cranberry and orange in flavour.
History: Discovered in 2005 at Halo in Atlanta, Georgia, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Ink No. 2 contains 154 calories
